ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi
ygData.msgSnippet: Talies the Wanderer  wrote: Back to EQ-related questions: Do you think a Bard can survive in EK at 16?  Solo? Yes, for a while -- but at
ygData.messageBody:
Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
Back to EQ-related questions:

Do you think a Bard can survive in EK at 16? Solo?

Yes, for a while -- but at 16 I think Lake Rathetear a better spot for xp.

My most memorable battle was fought solo in EK. I was 19th lvl and using my all instrument attack against a gorge hound. My hit points were dropping faster than I thought they should and with less than half a bubble of health, the hound dropped at my feet. To my surprise, I discovered another dead gorgehound behind me, explaining the extra lost hit points. It really brought me around to being proud of what I could do with a bard. After all, there aren't many classes that can solo two gorge hounds at 19 and then be ready to do it all over again with just a few minutes of downtime.

Tyunes of Rodcet nife
bard of 53 missed notes
